echo.mapper

Class SimpleMapper<E,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • echo.mapper.SimpleMapper<E,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The source class
    D - The target class
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContractMapper, PersonConfigMapper, PersonMapper

    public class SimpleMapper<E,D>
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps every field by field name between two given classes. If a field is instance of SimpleEntity or SimpleDTO, the field will not gets mapped.
